input_email_body:
Subject: Issue with project timeline sync

To the customer support team. Here is a brief description of the problem: The project timeline sync has failed unexpectedly You can reach me at sophia.rossi@service.it.. This could potentially be due to a Node.js compatibility problem My name is Jane Smith.. Despite restarting UniFi and reviewing WordPress settings, the issue remains unresolved.
